column4: hello there i have a squid proxy with dansgaurdian and i made an acl thats permits ports 25 110 443 but mail cannt be retreived from thundbird but should i do ??
i had a problem similar to yours. Then i realized squid is not meant to be used for anything else than HTTP
so wt should i do then ?? to enable access 110 25
configure Thunderbird to not use the proxy
